Translations.Text: Sapatha ahe akasaci ani andharata prakata honaryaci
Tumhala kaya mahita ki to ratri prakata honara kaya ahe
To eka tejasvi tara ahe
Asa konihi nahi, jyacyavara sanraksaka pharista (niyukta) nasela
Manasane vicara kela pahije ki tyala konatya vastupasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Tyala eka usalatya panyapasuna nirmana kele gele ahe
Je patha ani chati yancya daramyani bhagatuna nighate
Nihsansaya, to (allaha) tyala parata ananyavara niscitaca samarthya rakhanara ahe
Jya divasi gupta rahasyabhedanci janca-padatala keli ja'ila
Tevha tyaca na kahi jora calela ani na koni madatakarta asela
Parjan'yavrsti karanarya akasaci sapatha
Ani dubhanganarya jaminici sapatha
Nihsansaya, ha (kura'ana) katekora phaisala karanari bhasa ahe
Hi hasya-vinodaci (ani nirarthaka) gosta nahi
Tathapi inkari loka kata - karasthana karita aheta
Ani mi dekhila eka dava calata ahe
Tumhi ya inkari lokanna savada de'una taka, tyanna kahi divasa mokalika dya
Apalya ati ucca palanakartyacya navaci pavitrata varnana kara
Jyane nirmana kele ani sahi salamata banavile
Ani jyane (yathayogya) anumana kele ani maga margadarsana kele
Ani jyane taje gavata ugavile
Maga tyane te (sukavuna) kala kera - kacara karuna takale
Amhi tumhala sikavu, maga tumhi visaranara nahi
Parantu je kahi allaha icchila. Nihsansaya, to ughada ani lapalele sarva kahi janato
Ani amhi tumacyasathi sahajata nirmana karu
Tevha tumhi upadesa karita raha jara upadesa kahi labha de'ila
(Allahace) bhaya balaganara tara bodha grahana karila
Tathapi durdaivi, yapasuna dura palela
Jo mothya bhayankara agita dakhala ho'ila
Jithe maga to na marela, na jagela, (kimbahuna maranasanna sthititaca paduna rahila)
Nihsansaya, tyane saphalata prapta keli, jo svaccha sud'dha jhala
Ani jyane apalya palanakartyace nama smaranata thevale, ani namaja padhata rahila
